name: Forbytes
description:
We work closely with our client-partners to help them grow their businesses through the delivery and integration of smart technical solutions that are designed to deliver identified busness benefits.
Our development offices are based in the Ukrainian cities of Lviv and Uzhhorod.  
What we deliver for our client-partners:
Enterprise applications
Business automation
e-commerce solutions
Product development.
Master Data Management
Big Data
Machine Learning
Due-diligence
How we deliver quality services:
Manage complete software development processes for our client-partners
Dedicated Development Teams tailored to your needs
Software Portfolio & Project Management
Strategic advice on using technology to build your business.
Reasons to work with Forbytes
We make your life easier
Competative pricing
We match the right people& skills to fit your culture and business needs.
We have a record of delivering excellent quality services with dignity and will do the same for you.
